title: Function
summary: A function is a code snippet that can be called by other code or by itself, or a variable that refers to the function. When a function is called, arguments are passed to the function as input, and the function can optionally return a value. A function in JavaScript is also an object.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
